      <div class="modal-content">
         <div class="modal-header">
            <div class="modal-title">Sample Modal Large</div>
            <button type="button" class="button button--link close" aria-label="Close">
               <i class="icon-feather icon-feather--black icon-feather--bigger" data-feather="x"></i>
            </button>
         </div>
         <div class="modal-body">
            <p>Your content here...</p>
         </div>
         <div class="modal-footer">
            <button class="button button--hollow button--alt">Cancel</button>
            <button class="button button--primary button--alt">Submit</button>
         </div>
      </div>
   </div>
</div><!-- /.sample-modal-large -->
Live Demo


Button Trigger Modal

<button class="button button--primary button--alt" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#sampleModalLarge">Show Large Modal</button>  
<button class="button button--secondary button--alt" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#sampleModalSmall">Show Small Modal</button> 
<button class="button button--alt" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#sampleModalFullscreen">Show Fullsize Modal</button>
